column5: I realize it is not the Super7 or anything... But man am I pumped!!!  received this last night!  Gerritt, Congratulations!  You are this months Ontario Fishing Network's contest winner.  You have won a 1-year subscription to TNB - Esox Angler Magazine. Your subscription will begin with the Winter issue.  Please verify that the mailing address below is correct and the office will begin processing your subscription.  Congratulations! And thank you for entering.  Kind Regards,  Teresa Webinger The Next Bite - Esox Angler Magazine    Now... Lew got a spare seat? LOL!  Gerritt!
I can just see you now Gerritt, doing the happy dance just like your avitar.
very nice, I just watched Pete Maina on  John G. water and woods they were talking about Esox Angler Magazine
Yup, and I've also got all the gear you'll need too, just lemme know when  WTG Bud !!
Atta boy Gerritt. Bring a copy up with you this winter, I'd like to see it.
hahahahaha....    Hey Bernie, I saw Esox on the newstand at the Gateway Mall, the one by the Tim Hortons in there.
Every month you'll have that mag to look forward to. Congrats, happy reading.
Congrats Gerritt I know you'll put the knowledge to good use.
NUTS!! They don't send ANY through my Post Office that I can browse through . . . .     should I break down & buy one?
Na... get a route change Steve!

Hey congrats Gerritt  I'm sure you'll enjoy it. Please let us know.  Ha ha ... Photoz ... well, not sure what to tell you there. I guess I'd need to know your priorities, as we are all different. Does your wife or girlfriend fish ... if so, possibly she'd forgoe a dozen roses for a two year subscription if you promise to share with her. Of course cutting into beer money is a far more serious issue, tee hee.   Best wishes all.  Pete

Congrats Gerritt  You'll really like the mag, a lot of good info and most importantly fish porn to the max. I really enjoy getting mine and usually there is at least a couple OFC'ers in each issue.  Cheers!
Congrats!! Maybe you'll learn a few things that'll help you catch a nice fat 50+ Incher!!!
